alert.note: Alert for City of Franklin; City of Suffolk; Isle of Wight; Southampton (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued September 09 at 2:57PM EDT until September 09 at 3:30PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 330 PM EDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN ISLE OF WIGHT...AND EAST CENTRAL SOUTHAMPTON COUNTIES...THE CITY OF FRANKLIN AND THE SOUTHWESTERN CITY OF SUFFOLK... At 256 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Holland, moving northwest at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. This severe storm will be near... Holland, Suffolk, and Carrsville around 300 PM EDT. Zuni around 325 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Whitley, Collosse, Lees Mill, Lummis, Walters, Boaz, Burdette, Cleopus, Elwood, and Indika. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: City of Franklin; City of Suffolk; Isle of Wight; Southampton
